name: Werewolf Terror In City
description:
This creature is looking for revenge. He's been the one hunted for too long, now it’s time for him to do some hunting of his own. You are in control of this super-fast and agile animal.
This freaking face dangerous creature ready to slice its opponents into pieces!
Turn your claws to killing machines, hunt people, animals on your way. The Werewolf is the mythical beast that thrives when the moon is full. You control the huge animal as he comes out of the shadows ready to attack. Hunt or be hunted be a part of ultimate battle between human and wildlife jungle animals, play as wild monster and take down real human hunters in Werewolf Terror In City game.
You’re not the ordinary man; you’re a shape changer . Half-human, half-beast, you should live in both worlds.
This wild beast is looking for destruction of the city for surviving. Run and jump on the people and attack with extra power shot to end them immediately in this Slayer city simulator. Werewolf attack rampage is looking to kill anyone who comes within his sight. Experience the thrill of werewolf attack and rule over the city in this game . If you enjoy playing games like Shark Attack, Bear attack, Dinosaur attack, you will enjoy taking control of this giant beast.


Werewolf Terror In City: Features

Two different Modes (Easy & Challenging)
20 Challenging Missions
Dark Shadow city environment with Vibrant 3D graphics
Realistic Werewolf animations
Fast and action packed gameplay.
Plenty of sounds and visual effects
Show them the power of that dangerous monster Legend!
